# Network/USB Setting Menus

## Choosing a Connection Setting Profile

Follow the steps below to use pre-existing or user-created connection setting profiles.

1. Choose **SELECT CONNECTION SETTING** in the network/USB setting menu.

   !Select Connection Setting Menu

2. Choose the desired connection setting profile.

   !Connection Setting Profiles

## AIRPLANE MODE

Select **ON** to disable the cameraâ€™s wireless LAN and Bluetooth features.

|---------|--------|
| ON      | OFF    |
